name: Hyatt Regency Lake Tahoe
description: Hyatt Regency Lake Tahoe is a luxury lakefront resort in Incline Village with private beach, Stillwater Spa, casino, and direct access to Incline Village golf courses.
shortDescription: Luxury lakefront resort at Incline Village with private beach, spa, and golf course access.

roomTypes.name: Mountain View Room
roomTypes.description: Elegant room with mountain views, plush bedding, flat-screen TV, and Hyatt Grand Bed. Lake-side rooms also available.

roomTypes.name: Lakefront Cottage
roomTypes.description: Private lakefront cottage with direct beach access, fireplace, separate living area, and unobstructed Lake Tahoe views.

roomTypes.name: Grand Suite
roomTypes.description: Premium suite with panoramic lake views, separate living room, luxury bathroom with soaking tub, and exclusive lounge access.

faqs.question: Does Hyatt Lake Tahoe have a private beach?
faqs.answer: Yes — the resort features a private beach with direct Lake Tahoe access, seasonal water sports equipment, and lakeside dining.

faqs.question: What is the Stillwater Spa?
faqs.answer: A full-service spa offering massages, facials, body treatments, and a fitness center with indoor pool, all with mountain views.

faqs.question: How far is Hyatt from the ski resorts?
faqs.answer: Diamond Peak is about 5 minutes away, Northstar California approximately 15 minutes, and Palisades Tahoe about 30 minutes.

meta.title: Hyatt Regency Lake Tahoe | Luxury Resort & Golf Packages
meta.description: Luxury lakefront Hyatt with private beach, Stillwater Spa, and golf packages at Incline Village and Edgewood.

testimonials.quote: Hyatt Regency Lake Tahoe is an ideal spot for a golf getaway in Lake Tahoe. Close to great courses, good restaurants on-site or nearby, and the rooms have everything you need. GTHS knows exactly which room blocks to reserve for groups.
testimonials.author: Sharon C.

testimonials.quote: Our conference group of 40 stayed at Hyatt Regency Lake Tahoe. Meeting rooms were perfect, the rooms were comfortable, and being in Lake Tahoe meant we could add golf days to the agenda. GTHS made the whole package seamless.
testimonials.author: Tony H.

testimonials.quote: Stayed at Hyatt Regency Lake Tahoe for our golf trip and it was the perfect home base. Rooms were clean and spacious, location was ideal for hitting courses around Lake Tahoe. GTHS got us a group rate we couldn't find anywhere else.
testimonials.author: Kevin O.
